response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. Our product, which is truly a game-changer in its field, has been valued at $1,500,000 by you. I understand the immense value you see in this item and would like to offer it to you at a special price. My proposal is to sell it to you for $1,400,000. This is a fantastic deal considering its true worth, and I believe it represents a significant saving for you. I am confident that this investment will pay off in the long run. If you're interested, please let me know, and we can proceed with the transaction. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1400000}
